# loading data
```{r load df}
df <- read_csv('https://osf.io/4ay9x/download')
```

## We would like to look at the unconditional income difference bewteen men and female Lawyers, Judges, magistrates, and other judicial workers
```{r}
diff_mw <- df %>% 
  filter(!is.na(hhid)) %>% 
  filter(occ2012 == 2100) %>%
  select(sex, earnwke) %>% 
  group_by(sex) %>% 
    summarise(mean_earning = mean(earnwke),
            numObs = n())
diff_mw <- diff_mw %>% add_row(sex = NA , mean_earning = diff(diff_mw$mean_earning), numObs = sum(diff_mw$numObs))
diff_mw
```
## We can see that the difference in unconditional weekly gender pay gap between men and women is $297 on average in 1027 observations.
